channel.title: github on Insaaanimanav's blog
channel.description: Recent content in github on Insaaanimanav's blog

item.title: Github Profile Level Readme
item.description: Github Profile README GitHub recently released a feature that allows users to create a profile-level README to display on their GitHub profile. This article will help you to access this new feature. I’ll also be sharing some fun GitHub profiles I’ve seen so far. If you create yours don’t forget it to share it with me on twitter @insaanimanav . Why README’s This feature allows much more than what you can currently do with your bio on github.
